description: Earning an industry designation can enhance your knowledge and increase your credibility with clients and prospects. Follow the steps below to get started.

resourceStepList.title: Learn more about Financial Designations
resourceStepList.description: By continuing to increase your technical knowledge and practice management skills, you will be positioned to serve clients better than ever. In this environment of changing regulations, advisors who can adapt quickly and turn challenges into opportunities will outshine their peers. Explore the benefits of earning an Accredited Investment Fiduciary速, Certified Financial Planner速, Certified Wealth Strategist速 or Certified Retirement Counselor速 designation.

resourceStepList.title: Build a Plan to get Credentialed
resourceStepList.description: Once you understand the content and purpose behind each designation, it is important to know the process for earning the designation. You will need to find out how long it takes most advisors to go through the books or online resources. Some advisors are looking for online-only courses while other advisors enjoy group learning opportunities. Also consider the initial pricing for study guides and exams as well as renewal fees. You will also want to know the continuing education requirements. The attached resources can answer your questions.

resourceItems.description: Read: Guide to CFP Training Discounts

resourceStepList.title: Consult your Dedicated Business Consultant or Relationship Manager
resourceStepList.description: Speak with your dedicated Business Consultant or Relationship Manager to help determine which program is the best fit for you.
